alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 11:19AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN TUSCALOOSA... SOUTHEASTERN PICKENS AND NORTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM CST... At 1119 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jena, or 13 miles south of Gordo, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northport, Gordo, Coker, Samantha, Jena, Lake Lurleen State Park, Binion Creek Landing, Tuscaloosa Regional Airport, Benevola, Lake Tuscaloosa, Ralph, Moores Bridge, Buhl, Flatwoods, Tierce Pattton Bridge, Kirk, Pioneer, Echola, Highway 69 Bridge, and Romulus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
